items.subTitle: What payment method(s) is used on KAO?
items.content: The number of ways in which merchants can collect payments from their customers, for example, credit cards, digital wallets, direct debit, offline payment, etc. In a store, perhaps you use cash, credit cards, or mobile payment options like Apple Pay.

items.subTitle: How is domestic shipping handled on KAO?
items.content: Shipping is managed through several partners, offering domestic options. Customers can choose their preferred shipping method at checkout.

items.subTitle: How is international shipping handled on KAO?
items.content: International shipping options are available. Additional charges may apply based on the destination country and shipping method selected.

items.subTitle: How do I become an agent on KAO?
items.content: Becoming an agent on KAO requires registration through our online platform. You'll need to provide identification and complete a background check.

items.subTitle: What are the commission rates for agents?
items.content: Agents earn commissions based on sales volume. Commission rates vary by product category and are paid out monthly.

items.subTitle: How do I use a voucher on KAO?
items.content: To use a voucher, enter the voucher code at checkout. The discount will be applied to your order total.

items.subTitle: What are the terms and conditions for vouchers?
items.content: Vouchers are subject to terms and conditions, including expiry dates and specific usage criteria. Please refer to the voucher details for more information.

items.subTitle: How can I start selling on KAO?
items.content: To start selling on KAO, sign up as a merchant, list your products, and set your prices. Our platform provides tools to manage your inventory and track sales.

items.subTitle: What are the fees for selling on KAO?
items.content: KAO charges a small commission on each sale. The fee structure is transparent, and there are no hidden costs. Details can be found in the seller agreement.

items.subTitle: What is the return policy on KAO?
items.content: Customers can return products within 30 days of purchase if they meet the return conditions. Please refer to our return policy for more details.

items.subTitle: How does the refund process work?
items.content: Refunds are processed after returned items are inspected. Refunds are issued to the original payment method and typically take 5-7 business days.

items.subTitle: What are the delivery times for orders?
items.content: Delivery times vary depending on the shipping method chosen at checkout. Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days, while express delivery takes 1-2 business days.

items.subTitle: How can I track my order?
items.content: Orders can be tracked through the KAO website. Log in to your account and go to the 'Orders' section to view tracking information.

items.subTitle: How do I update my account information?
items.content: Account information can be updated by logging into your KAO account and navigating to the 'Account Settings' section. Make sure to save any changes.

items.subTitle: How can I reset my password?
items.content: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password via email.
